sentences.sentence: Net friend reality pat some column scene Augean stable!
sentences.translation: 网友实拍某栏目现场——肮脏！

sentences.sentence: He should have resolved to cleanse these Augean banking stables.

sentences.sentence: How to clean the Augean stables of this city remains a critical problem.
sentences.translation: 如何扫除这个城市的积弊仍然是个紧要问题。
